metadata.title: CVE-2019-15165 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
sf-pcapng.c in libpcap before 1.9.1 does not properly validate the PHBheader length before allocating memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpcap0.8 - 1.7.4-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpcap package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.4-2ubuntu0.1').
